entries.journal_entry_description: Rhiek Okina, leader of the Quietus Sect, revers the Webweaver Spiders has brethren in the art of assassination. It is common for members of the Sect to use Gravespinner venom as a potent weapons against common enemies. Rhiek needs 10 Gravespinner Glands.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Collect 10 Gravespinner Glands and return to Rhiek Okina.
